    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(String statement)
        Hide this method to use the class. This method is meant to be hidden by it's subclasses. It is called in a tree-like structure down the children of Statement.
        Parameters:
        statement - the statement to analyze
        Returns:
        whether it is a valid instruction

      • getStatementFrom

        public static Statement getStatementFrom(String statement)
                                  throws InvalidStatementException
        Hide this method to use the class. This method is meant to be hidden by it's subclasses. It is called in a tree-like structure down the children of Statement.

        It is very important to verify that the statement is valid before using this method. If it is not valid, it will throw InvalidStatementException.

        Parameters:
        statement - the statement to analyze
        Returns:
        a Statement object of the type
        Throws:
        InvalidStatementException - thrown when statement is malformed

        run in class Instruction
